7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Conjure Celestial
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You summon a celestial of challenge rating 4 or lower, which appears in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Divine Word
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You speak a word of God, filled with the power of the divine.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Etherealness
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Fire Storm
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Plane Shift
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Regenerate
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Resurrection
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn’t die of old age, and that isn’t undead.

7thLevelClericSpells.Name: Symbol
7thLevelClericSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a harmful glyph either on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, or a table) or within an object.
